name: MBTABusTime
0:
”Alexa, open bus time”
”Alexa, give me a summary with bus time”
”Alexa, where is route 553 with bus time”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bus time
des: The skill gives users a generic summary on when buses are arriving at stops based on what users configure their Alexa to. This skill assumes that users know which buses and stops to configure their skills on, and gets schedule information from the MBTA live website. Please visit https://www.mbta.com/schedules/bus to find your stop and record your stop ID from the URL for configuration.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
